    ReflectionUtils
    Gets the value of a reflected field.
    ResourceLocator  
    SafeBitmapDrawable
    Because bitmaps may expire in cache while still attached to a view, we need to provide a catch-all otherwise the app will crash if a view tries to draw a recycled bitmap.
